A message from Congressman Adam Smith: Home Issues Legislation Services Hello, I am pleased to invite you to my office's upcoming virtual grants workshop on Monday, December 12, 2022. We will be joined by representatives from Health Resources and Services Administration (HRSA) who will provide information on HRSA's workforce programs, current and upcoming funding opportunities, and strategies to respond effectively to HRSA funding announcements.
